It is recommended to eat a variety of vegetables every day. Some of the most nutritious vegetables include dark leafy greens, cruciferous vegetables (such as broccoli and cauliflower), beans and legumes, and root vegetables (such as carrots and potatoes).

It is recommended to eat a variety of vegetables everyday, including dark leafy greens, cruciferous vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower, Brussels sprouts), and root vegetables (carrots, beets, turnips, potatoes).
